name: Utopia Syndrome
description: Utopia Syndrome - is a new perspective on «point and click» adventure games. Unique visual style and top-down gaming perspective. The intersection of destinies, mysterious parallel storylines in a horror, mystic and world exploration adventure game. Click, read and interact, gather inventory items, notes and clues to solve puzzles to progress further. Immerse yourself in the dark corners of Utopia world to remember your past, present and future.
